mapper.select: select * from t_alarm a join t_alarm_content b on a.alarm_content_idx=b.alarm_content_idx join t_category c on b.category_idx=c.category_idx where a.mb_idx=#{mbIdx} and a.alarm_at like concat('%', #{date}, '%')
select * from t_memo a inner join t_category b on a.category_idx = b.category_idx where a.mb_idx=#{mbIdx} and a.memo_at like concat('%', #{date}, '%') order by memo_update_at desc
